Reviews.Title: Great bundle. Everything you need to get started.
Reviews.Author: Ryan Holsonback
Reviews.Content: I compared this package with several others that were being offered during the Christmas season and it was the best one out there for the money. It gives you everything you need to get started.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card +
<4> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <5> Spare LP-E10 Battery for Canon + <6> Battery Charger for LP-E10 +
<7> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <8> Additional Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <9> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <10> PD Digital SLR Camera Case +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens with 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Battery & Charger + Tripod + Tele/Wide Lens Kit
